dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a force directed graph the API does not work the same any longer.
dataJson.name: Relationships with a Force Directed Graph
dataJson.story: This was a good project and it made you see data visualisation from a different perspective.  The only thing I regret is that I did not took a screen shot of the result when I finished the project. Shortly after, freecodecamp moved it's discussion board to reddit so the project API was no longer available. Nonetheless the project is done, the main concept are learned and even tho there is a new project that  uses a different api to achieve kinda the same result, I have decided not to change my original code and I just adjusted it al little bit to take the data from reddit.

techs.description: A programming language used for scripting web browser
techs.name: Javascript

techs.description: A library for visual data representation
techs.name: D3
